name: SwimWays Spring Float Premium Recliner Pool Lounger, Inflatable Pool Floats Adult with Fast Inflation for Ages 15 & Up, Sky Blue
short_description: ULTRA FAST INFLATION: Pool toys with Hyper-Flate Valve maximize airflow for easy inflation in a fraction of the time, and the pump-free design prevents air from escaping for our fastest inflation ever
MULTI-USE: The perfect sit-up style pool lounger is great for relaxing and socializing with friends, this recliner is ideal for floating at the lake or in the pool
PATENTED INNER SPRING DESIGN: Inner spring sewn around the outside edge of this adult pool float offers greater comfort and stability in the water

ULTIMATE COMFORT: Lay back in the mesh seat and integrated headrest, backrest, and footrest and float into relaxation; The recliner suspend your lower body just below the water's surface and includes a built-in cup holder to keep your drink close
DIMENSIONS: These inflatable pool floats measure 55 in x 38 in x 15.5 in and supports most adults up to 250 lbs, recommended for ages 15 and up
Includes: 1 SwimWays Spring Float Recliner
Covered by the Spin Master Care Commitment. See below for full details
product_description: Float through summer, wherever it takes you! SwimWays’ line of foldable, portable Spring Floats keep you comfortably cool for hours of relaxation and fun. Our new and exclusive Hyper-Flate Valve brings you our fastest and easiest inflation ever, so you have more time to spend in the water doing what you love. Unfold, inflate and float away in the SwimWays Spring Float Premium Recliner floating pool lounger! Within minutes you’ll be luxuriating in the soft, cooling mesh seat that suspends your lower body just below the surface of the water. Prop yourself up on the integrated headrest, backrest, and ottoman, and stash your favorite beverage in the cup holder. The fabric covering over this inflatable pool float adds durability, and the patented inner spring along the outside edge of the float provides greater stability and comfort in the water. Our patent-pending Hyper-Flate Valve makes inflation and deflation quick and easy, so you'll be in and out of the water three times faster. It minimizes direct contact while maximizing airflow, allowing for easy inflation in a fraction of the time, with a unique pump-free design that prevents air from escaping between breaths. Deflate just as quickly by inserting the tail of the valve cap and folding the float into three compact circles for convenient portability and storage making it perfect for travel. Weight capacity: Supports most adults up to 250 lb (113 kg). Measure (when fully inflated) 55 in x 38 in x 15.5 in. Sold individually.
product_details: Personal Flotation Device Type Pool Float
Manufacturer recommended age 15 years and up

name: 2 Pack Pool Floats Adult,Inflatable Pool Lounger Float Heavy Duty with Cup Holder, Backrest & Footrest Pool Lounge Float Extra Large Pool Rafts for Adults Beach Lake Party
short_description: POOL LOUNGER FLOAT WITH BACKREST & FOOTREST - Indulge in ultimate relaxation with our premium pool float lounger. Featuring a soft mesh seat, ergonomic backrest, and open footrest design, this pool lounger float ensures a cool, supportive and refreshing experience. Perfect for lounging, light exercises, or simply soaking up the sun, it’s your go-to for summer relaxation.

EXTRA-LARGE HEAVY DUTY POOL LOUNGER FLOAT - Our oversized pool lounger measures 63"L x 34.6"W, offering plenty of space for adults and teens to stretch out comfortably. Made from premium raft-grade vinyl, this heavy-duty adult size pool float supports up to 300 lbs, ensuring durability and stability while you’re floating in the pool or soaking up the sun at the beach.

MESH COOLING SEAT & OPEN FOOTREST AREA - Stay cool and relaxed with our innovative cooling mesh seat and open footrest design. The mesh seat gently submerges you into the water, while the open footrest lets your legs dangle freely, creating a refreshing and comfortable floating experience. Perfect for lounging, sunbathing on hot summer days.

BUILT-IN DRINK HOLDER & QUICK-INFLATE VALVE - Enjoy your favorite beverage without leaving the water. This inflatable pool float features convenient cup holder to keep drinks within reach. The quick-inflate valve ensures fast and easy setup, whether you’re using a manual pump or an electric air pump. Spend less time inflating and more time relaxing.

ENJOYABLE INTERACTIVE FLOATING FUN FOR ADULTS - The heavy-duty tether clips on this pool lounge float would add a playful twist to your pool time, ensuring a strong and reliable connection between two floats for interactive adventure–whether you’re bumping floats with friends or floating side-by-side with family. Perfect companion for all your summer adventures.

short_description: Experience three ways to lounge! Quickly convert your float between a relaxing reclining hammock, a stable sit-up lounge chair, and a secure "hands-free" saddle seat. One float fits all your water moods.

Includes a handy carry bag for simple storage and transport. Inflates in minutes with any standard pump (electric pump recommended). Deflates quickly and packs away neatly, making spontaneous water days a breeze.

Designed for every aquatic setting! Enjoy stable, comfortable floating in your backyard pool, on a peaceful lake, or in the gentle surf at the beach. It’s the one float you need for all your favorite summer spots.
